title: Don't Mind the Sex of Others
description:
A girl who works on a coffee shop encounters her ex-girl friend, and the rumor of she being a lesbian spreads. Then, she meets with an homophobic person.
[url=https://twitter.com/wanwangomigomi]Author's Twitter[/url]

matches.title: Yama no Susume - AoHina Saitei Manga (Doujinshi)
